title: The Cabbage Field (Le Champ des Choux)
medium: soft ground etching on buff colored laid paper
credit_line: Robert S. Waters Charitable Trust Fund
provenance_text:
Camille Pissarro [1830-1903]. H. M. Petiet [1894-1980], Paris, France; sold at Piasa, Paris, France, June 4, 2009, no. 166 [1]. Hill-Stone Incorporated, New York, NY, by May 2010; purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, October 2010.
 
Notes:
[1]. Sale "Estampes Petiet ." This was one of the posthumous sales of the art dealer Henri Petiet.

creator.birth_place: Charlotte Amalie (Virgin Islands of the United States) (Danish colony at the time)
